text: Wall covering type (vinyl, fabric, wood, FRP) and pattern matches finish schedule
Adhesive type and spread rate match approved submittals and manufacturer guidance
Accessory trims (corner guards, base reveals, end caps) reviewed and on site
Rolls or panels conditioned and inspected for dye lot or surface flaws
Substrate clean, smooth, and sealed if required (especially drywall)
Primer or sizing applied to porous or gypsum surfaces per spec
Wall surface flat and free from bumps or defects visible through covering

id: C. Installation – Sheet Vinyl or Fabric

text: Pattern alignment verified at seams and corners
Seams tight and not overlapped unless manufacturer allows
Corners tight and top edge aligned with control or datum line

id: D. Installation – FRP or Wood Panel Systems

text: Panels cut cleanly, fit tight to corner trims, and gapped per spec
Adhesive coverage >95% with consistent contact on substrate
Mechanical fasteners installed per detail (if required)
All exposed trims and accessories installed straight and flush
Surface cleaned, no glue bleed, bubbles, or discoloration
Final walkthrough approved by consultant and punchlist cleared

id: • ASTM F793 / F742, ASTM E84 – Wall Covering Fire and Physical Standards
• Manufacturer Specs: Koroseal, Maharam, MDC, Marlite, Crane Composites
